alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Decatur; Grady; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 27 at 6:42PM EDT until April 27 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 174, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE GADSDEN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS LOWNDES THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA DECATUR GRADY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADAMS BEACH, ALMA, ATHENA, AUSMAC, BAINBRIDGE, BEACHTON, BETHEL, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYD, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, COOKS HAMMOCK, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DAY, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, ELPINO, EMPRESS, FESTUS, GRADY CO A/P, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HILLIARDVILLE, HINES, HOPEWELL, JARROTT, JONESBORO, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LITTMAN, LOVETT, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MAYO, METCALF, MIDWAY, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, OLD TOWN, PASCO, PERRY, PINE PARK, PINETTA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, SANTA CLARA, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, AND YELLOW JACKET.
